Content.Content:
[$BOX] [$CELL] [$BLOCK]

The patient who is two-hours post-operative following abdominal hysterectomy is not expected to have excessive vaginal bleeding; her heart rate and BP are also indicative of excessive blood loss; therefore, the nurse’s first response should be to contact the surgeon.

[$/BLOCK] [$/CELL] [$/BOX]
Content.Name: SAFE AND EFFECTIVE CARE ENVIRONMENT 26
